## MathBlock.Clear method

Removes all elements from the collection.

```csharp
public void Clear()
```

### Examples

Example:

```csharp
[C#]
MathBlock mathBlock = new MathBlock(new MathematicalText("x"));
mathBlock.Clear();
```
